fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Irresistible (Night, 3 use): You will deal a Basic attack to the first player that visited you tonight. The first player who visited you is defined as the first player who sent in their action.
- Desire to Kill (Night, 1 use): Select three players. You will deal a Basic attack to all players that your targets visit. If any of your targets that were not roleblocked do not visit anyone, your ability will fail, and you will regain your charge.
